medium: Polyester; heat molded hand pleating, transfer print
title: Origami Pleats
description: light moss green that fades to cream color; shape is created by two-sheet paper patterns between which was laid plain polyester fabric, heat- pressed; folds and transfer printed in different colors by hand; all edges serged; three dimensional origami pleats
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons and Rosa Lynn Pinkus
